messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re. Mother of BORED
messages.msgSnippet: We read in the morning, and at bedtime as a family. We just started the Harry Potter series, and I really love it. My 4 year old doesnt sit still, but he knows
messages.messageBody:
We read in the morning, and at bedtime as a family. We
just started the Harry Potter series, and I really
love it. My 4 year old doesnt sit still, but he knows
whats going on in the story. The baby doesnt even seem
to notice theres a story being read, except for trying
to take the book out of Dad's hands once in a while.
Also, my oldest reads to the other 2 boys alot, if
they'll listen. He gets really upset when they dont
listen to him :)
Kerry

messages.subject: Re. Mother of BORED
messages.msgSnippet: I have always read to all my 5 children at bed time. Everything from Fairy tales to Aesop.  There have ben the favourites that were read so many times we knew
messages.messageBody:
I have always read to all my 5 children at bed time. Everything from
Fairy tales to Aesop. There have ben the favourites that were read
so many times we knew the whole story off by heart.
My youngest (12yrs) gave up wanting to be read to about 12 months
ago.....
marianne
